data.title: Matrix
data.Actors: Nick Mancuso, Phillip Jarrett, Carrie-Anne Moss
data.Plot: Hitman Steven Matrix is shot, experiences afterlife, gets second chance by helping others. Wakes up, meets guides assigning cases where he aids people using unorthodox methods from past profession.

data.title: Up
data.Writer: Pete Docter, Bob Peterson, Tom McCarthy
data.Actors: Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger
data.Plot: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

data.title: The Avengers
data.Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson
data.Plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
data.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 39 wins & 81 nominations total
